title: I Was Reincarnated as a Poor Farmer in a Different World, so I Decided to Make Bricks to Build a Castle - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Animal Rearing   Cheats   Child Protagonist   Domestic Affairs   Familiars   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Farming   Gore   Hard-Working Protagonist   Kingdom Building   Magic   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Knowledge   Multiple POV   Poor Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Rebellion   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Strategic Battles   Sword And Magic   Vocaloid
author: Cancellara   カンチェラーラ
description:
A baby was born in a world of swords and magic, crying innocently.

The boy held the memory of Japan, a different world from the world he lived in.

However, he was born as the son of a poor farmer.

The boy, who witnessed the harsh reality, was driven off to the situation that couldn’t be called a “slow life”.

Using his specialty, earth magic, the boy initiated to fill his hungry stomach.>
